Pre-Game Insights: Malawi are looking for their second win of the campaign and boosting their progression hopes.
Sao Tome are looking for their first win of the campaign.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the first official clash between the sides in history.
Sao Tome have not won a game since March 2022.
Malawi have lost their last three official games.
Others: Malawi host Sao Tome and Principe at the Bingu National Stadium in Freetown on Thursday.
Sao Tome are one of the weakest teams in the world.
Malawi are no behemoths but have enough in the tank to secure the victory in this clash.
